name: DGCP MaMeeFarm Proof 442 — Shared Meal Under Resource Constraints
description:
Daily subsistence activity at MaMeeFarm.

The image documents food preparation:
stir-fried Chinese cabbage with pork sausage (moo yor),
prepared as a single shared meal for two people.

This record reflects daily living and labor continuity
under limited resources, where food, energy, and time
are managed carefully to sustain ongoing work.

Timestamp and DGCP watermark are embedded directly in the image.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
